verses.verse: From the <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> will I <S%H7121>cry<s%> unto <S%H3820>you<s%>, when my heart is <S%H5848>overwhelmed<s%>: <S%H5148>lead<s%> me to the <S%H6697>rock<s%> that is higher than <S%H7311>I<s%>.
For you have been a <S%H4268>shelter<s%> for <S%H5797>me<s%>, and a strong <S%H4026>tower<s%> <S%H6440>from<s%> the <S%H341>enemy<s%>.
I will <S%H1481>stay<s%> in your <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%>: I will <S%H2620>trust<s%> in the <S%H5643>shelter<s%> of your <S%H3671>wings<s%>. <S%H5542>Selah<s%>.
For <S%H430>you<s%>, O God, have <S%H8085>heard<s%> my <S%H5088>vows<s%>: you have <S%H5414>given<s%> me the <S%H3425>heritage<s%> of those that <S%H3373>fear<s%> your <S%H8034>name<s%>.
You will <S%H3254>prolong<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H3117>life<s%>: and his <S%H8141>years<s%> as <S%H1755>many<s%> <S%H1755>generations<s%>.
He shall <S%H3427>stay<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%>: O <S%H4487>prepare<s%> <S%H2617>mercy<s%> and <S%H571>truth<s%>, which may preserve <S%H5341>him<s%>.
So will I <S%H2167>sing<s%> praise unto your <S%H8034>name<s%> for <S%H5703>ever<s%>, that I may <S%H3117>daily<s%> <S%H7999>perform<s%> my <S%H5088>vows<s%>.
